General.Name: Chongqing Zhifei Bio Products
General.Description: Chongqing Zhifei Biological Products Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and marketing of vaccines and biological products in China. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Chongqing, China.

5.Name: Ms. Zhang  Jing
5.Title: VP,  Assistant to the Gen. Mang.
